Question: This person later completed his master of science degree in aeronautical engineering at the University of Southern California.
Hints: During the Apollo 11 launch, this person's heart reached a top rate of 110 beats per minute.
In the entire Apollo 11 photographic record, there are only five images of this person partly shown or reflected.
A jeep driven by a roommate from flight school picked this person up; it is unknown what happened to the wreckage of No.
